summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4891 for the construction of a trunk sewer along the following described route to-wit: Madison Street, from the outer harbor line to the end of the existing 36-inch brick sewer, 9.6 feet easterly of the easterly margin of Railroad Avnue, under Ordinance No. 56148, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
